syndromes: "Leg Qi" due to Cold Dampness in the legs and feet

symptoms: Swelling of the feet and calves
Numbness, cold and/or pain in the the feet and calves
Spasms and up-rushing that reaches the chest (running piglet)

notes: This formula is most effective when taken early in the morning.
